description: 14 - June 24) flex dates (Brookline), 1BR, 800, Short term sublet (from May 14 -- June 24 -- dates somewhat flexible),  newly renovated,  nicely decorated,  700 square foot,  1 bedroom (King size bed in bedroom + pull out couch in living room) apartment available in Brookline,  MA.Brookline is a neighborhood that was once technically part of Boston (and is still surrounded by Boston proper neighborhoods) but became its own entity years ago to better manage a smaller area (which makes it one of the nicest parts of the city).The apartment is on a quiet street,  but just steps to Coolidge Corner where you find all kinds of restaurants,  an independent movie theater,  coffee shops,  and shopping. It is very walkable to Fenway,  Allston,  Brighton. . . a quick T ride on the Green Line to easy access to most anywhere in the city,  and steps away from bus 66 which takes you to Harvard Square in Cambridge. The perfect combination of a quiet place to stay,  right near anything you would want to do! We love it!The apartment has an eat-in kitchen with stove/oven,  full sized fridge and dishwasher. The living room is equipped with an HD tv,  a new pull out couch,  a chair / ottoman,  and coffee table. There is also a desk with a computer and printer available for your use. The bedroom has a super comfy king sized bed and plenty of shelf space for your things. The bathroom was recently renovated. . .it has a glass shower with multiple shower heads,  and a mirror large enough for 2 to use to get ready. . .it all makes for an awesome way to start your day. Wifi,  water,  heat included. The building is nice and the neighbors respectful,  so we expect the same from our renters.1 off street parking spot included. Washer and dryer in building. Unfortunately we can't accommodate pets.We are a French/American couple who will be returning to Paris for part of the summer and are looking for someone responsible (or a couple) to take care of our place while we are gone. We've sublet like this many times over the years and it has always been a great experience.We are asking for $800 a week but can lower the asking price significantly if rented for more than 3 weeks (we aren't trying to make any money on this,  just cover a majority of our rent while we are gone).Please contact us if you are interested,  we'd be happy to send you more pictures,  answer and questions you have or meet you if possible.

description: ), 2BR, 1200, Hello!I am looking for someone to sublet my room in an amazing 2 bed/1 bath apartment on Beacon Street in Brookline. The apartment is located directly across from the Hawes Street T stop. It is less than a 5 minute walk away from Kenmore/Fenway,  Coolidge Corner,  Boston University,  Whole Foods,  Longwood hospitals,  and really anything else you may need.The apartment is spacious,  has plenty of closet space and has an amazing roof deck which is great for the summer! Amory Park is also right behind the apartment building if you are looking for some green space. There is also a dishwasher and a very nice laundry room in the building on the first floor. The bedroom will NOT be furnished,  but the rest of the apartment will be. It's on the first floor of the building,  (not a garden level unit) so it's really easy for moving!Rent is $1200/month. This is really a steal for both the location and apartment. The apartment will be available after May 15th if you would like to move in early! (Also possible to stay on after 9/1 if interested in a year lease.)My roommate is a female young professional and great to live with. We are looking for someone who is also a young professional,  organized,  and friendly to come live in our apartment for the summer!

description: * (Central NY), 4BR, 667000, FOR SALE BY OWNER: Hidden gem,  a must see,  you will not find another like it! House sits on a 'Dead End' road,  atop 170 acre farm in the town of South New Berlin,  Chenango County,  NYS.Property,  1.5 miles road frontage,  pond,  stream,  woodlot,  high tensile fenced pastures and hayfields. Farm produces beef,  hay,  saw logs and firewood. Two story post and beam barn; upstairs for hay bales,  downstairs with tack room,  5 stalls,  chicken coop and large run in area for beef/horses.House,  4 bedrooms and 4 full baths,  loft,  office,  chef's kitchen (2 stoves,  2 dishwashers,  2 sinks,  and 2 exhaust hoods),  hardwood floors throughout,  tile in the 4 baths and mud room,  full dry basement with canning kitchen and cold cellar for canned vegetable and apple storage,  10 zone baseboard heating with oil and wood boilers connected in series, . 2 wood stoves in the living areas, ,  porch,  deck and manicured grounds. Heated mud room with closet,  large 2 car garage is attached,  insulated and finished. Property well suited for wild life watching,  hunting,  campsites and/or agritourism. House can be set up as mother-in-law suite or income producing B & B.Lay of the land is scenic,  from flat to gently rolling meadows with 300 wild apple trees that grow tasty apples making very good cider and 40 bearing blueberry bushes. Wildlife ranging from rabbits,  geese,  ducks,  grouse and deer are plentiful. Property can be certified organic.Trails in the woodlot and along the meadows afford excellent horseback riding,  4 wheeling,  ski mobiling,  hiking or cross country skiing. Property is within a mile of state lands and 2 miles of an unfunded state park with large pond and camping sites. Site seeing in Cooperstown is within 25 miles,  shopping is convenient locally in Norwich (10 miles),  Oneonta (20 miles),  or in Binghamton,  Syracuse or Utica,  less than a hour away. Albany is 1+45 minutes and NYC is 3+30.In addition to providing a move in ready home with income producing opportunity,  numerous possibilities exist (See Farm Possibilities listed below) for this property. $667, 000.00.Property:170 acres1.5 miles road frontage45 Acre WoodlotWild apple trees (300)Blueberry bushes (40)Hay fieldsGrazing pasturesElectric high tensile fencingStreamPonds (3)House:Bedrooms (4)OfficeLoftBaths (4)Floors,  Hardwood and TilePost and BeamPella Pro series widows/doorsHunter Ceiling Fans (5)Mud room2 brick chimneys,  3 flues each2 wood stovesPorchDeckKitchen:2 gas stoves2 dishwashers2 sinks w/disposal4 ovensMicrowave2 exhaust hoodsGarage:Oversized 2 carInsulatedFinishedBasement:Full basement10 Zone heatingOil boilerWood boilerMegastore hot water heaterCold cellarCanning kitchenStove/refrigerator/freezer/sinksWalk up to garageBarn:Horse stallsChicken coopHay mowLarge run in areaHot/cold waterElectricTack roomOff road diesel fuel tankFarm products:Live BeefFreezer beef cutsSaw LogsFirewoodCamp woodHayFarm possibilities:Campground sitesPrivate runwayPolo fieldHoop greenhousesPermaculture farmingTrail riding and Hiking trailsReserved HuntingWildlife & Native plant preserveOrganic Meat & ProduceBed & Breakfast/Country InnMother-in-law suiteAgritourismDay CampBaseball CampHorse breeding & trainingFoster Care &/or Job TrainingChristmas tree farmA rural place to retireCider MillLocation:106 Shaver RoadSouth New Berlin,  NY 13843Chenango CountyPrice: $667, 000.00Contact: Email for additional information or to arrange a farm viewing.
